title: TF1 Group - Wikipedia
snippet: The group was formed after TF1 was privatized in April 1987 in which the channel was launched back on 6 January 1975 twelve years prior. It is controlled with a 43% stake by industrial group Bouygues, and is quoted on Euronext Paris. The history of TF1 traces back to 1975, when the Office de Radiodiffusion-Télévision Française (ORTF) was split into 7 successor institutions...

title: TF1 - Wikipedia
snippet: On 16 April, its president, Francis Bouygues, presented a check of three billion francs to the government, completing the privatisation of TF1. TF1's current logo was unveiled on February 2nd, 1990. It launched a news network, La Chaîne Info (LCI), in 1994. The channel was available in Italy ...

title: TF1 Group
snippet: Founded in 1975 by the French Government and privatized in 1987, the TF1 group is the owner of TF1, Europe’s largest private TV channel.
